game.name: Asteroid Boom Cosmic Courier
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You’re no hero—you’re a subcontractor. Drop the bomb, dodge the blast, and hope the paperwork clears. 4-player physics chaos in a space platformer with no safety net.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re no hero—you’re a subcontractor. Drop the bomb, dodge the blast, and hope the paperwork clears. 4-player physics chaos in a space platformer with no safety net.
